trans-unit.source: Provides a set of <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
This means that they can be called like an instance method on any <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object.
The methods in this class operate on <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> objects that are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
Waits indefinitely for the underlying <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref> to complete.

Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
Waits for the specified amount of time for the underlying <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref> to complete.

Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
The amount of time to wait.
The <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is not associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>; otherwise, `false`.
